column4: 1994-95 In Review The (Long Overdue) Third Annual Omaha Burgdorf Family's End-of-Year Review! Composed and Written for your Enlightenment by Darryl Proofread and Approved for your Protection by Joy Scribbled Upon for your Amusement by Cassandra Glanced At in Passing by Carl Well, here it is the end of 1995, and I'm finally getting around to writing this letter which should have gone out some six months ago. So much for "annual," eh? I'd love to claim that circumstances beyond my contro

1992-94 In Review Greetings from Darryl and Joy! OK, first things first. Yes, this is a "form letter." It's an American Tradition, after all, to write long annual letters and send them to all your friends and acquaintances, so that they can throw them out unread. It's of questionable utility as a tool for communication, but hey, it keeps the paper recycling folks in business. Thus, we present: The Second Annual (1994) Omaha Burgdorf End-of-Year Review! Now, if you're actually bothering

column2: Re: How reliable is password encryption?
column4: : Ever since I started requiring profiles and passwords, I've : had a steady stream of complaints from folks saying that : quite suddenly their password isn't valid any more. At : first I wrote it off the the usual--user stupidity--but I : get easily two or three almost identical complains every : week, some even from people whom I credit with a grain of : intelligence. : To Darryl and fellow WebBBS admins, : In the past several weeks, our WebBBS site has come under : attack from a sophisticated spammer based in Russia. : I am starting this new threads to see if any other WebBBS : sites have come under similar attack, and to coordinate a : response to this spammer. : Logs show that the attacker's script issues a rapid-fire : series of WebBBS commands, first creating a new profile, : then posting a series of messages under the new alias. : We have suffered fourt

To Darryl and fellow WebBBS admins, In the past several weeks, our WebBBS site has come under attack from a sophisticated spammer based in Russia. I am starting this new threads to see if any other WebBBS sites have come under similar attack, and to coordinate a response to this spammer. Logs show that the attacker's script issues a rapid-fire series of WebBBS commands, first creating a new profile, then posting a series of messages under the new alias. We have suffered fourteen such attacks in

: Can I have a frequency cap for a campaign with Webadverts : 3.20? : Example: I want a banner to be displayed only twice to the : same user, either for the whole duration of the campaign, : or for a given period. This could be cookie based. You can set how many times a particular user will be credited (recorded) as viewing of (or clicking on) a banner by setting the $DupViewTime, $DupClickTime, $ClickViewTime variable accordingly. They will not stop the displaying of the ads, just the recording

column2: Need someone to set up WEbbbs for website

What forms of payment do you accept? Credit Card/Paypal? Please let me know as soon as you can as I would like to implement this asap. Thanks much Brad Callen free-weight-loss-resources.com

column2: Re: Question about "Banners Shown On Your Site"
column4: : The stats I'm confused about is the "Banners Shown On : Your Site 2". That means that the banner code for that account was installed on a web page and 2 other ads have been displayed by it. That is how banner exchange members earn display credits which then allow their banner to be shown elsewhere. Dan O.

: You guys are great, extremly fast at 1 AM in the morning, our : site is back up thanks! Only 10:00 where I live. But your right it's One where Kevin lives, and since it's an NT box he's the one who get's the credit. -- John

: I've installed WebAdverts an it seems to work fine. I'm able : to set up accounts and view logs : I put the suggested code on my page - but no banner. If you copied the banner HTML code from the administration section, it means that that account has been set up as a 'banner exchange' member. In that case, that account's banner will not display until it earns exposure credits by showing banners on its site PLUS it will never show its own banner anyway, only other account's banners (provided tho

column4: : Something disappeared on me though? When you first went into : account administration and selected an account to edit, did : it not give you a text box that showed you what code to : insert into your page to make the ad display? Mine did. But : now that my ads show up on the screen, I no longer get that : text box showing me the code to insert. Go figure...
